name: Wake up, Mommy...
description:
Cyberjunk, coughs* Im meant... Cyberpunk...

This is based of the meme "Wake up Mommy, I just missed the bus". yes its supposed to be bad because its just funny and because the meme itself was made to be low-quality in purpose.
The original meme character was based of Cyberpunk and has the Cyberpunk meme.
This is just a short game I made cuz I was bored.
And I did not mean to offened any Cyberpunk fans...

-Instructions-
--Press start?
--It should say in the game
--Haha funny
